This is honestly so good.

- Sharing is caring.

- It's chicken leg.

as a punishment.

with your blankets.

I'm so sleepy.

just ask him to join.
I think we're doing so well.

[Here I am]

[Third warning]

[Confused[
You need to tell me
how to wear this!

[A cute shrimp tempura]
- So cute.
- It looks very warm.

[She's not even pretending]

This is how we sleep in Japan.

[Pulling foreigner card
only when things go wrong]

I've been very patient with you.

[No more leniency]
You will all get a punishment next time.

[Getting fried perfectly]

[Enough with the tempura dance]
We should be practicing right now!

We need to get ready
for the talent show.

- Are we the worst?

[Please stop]
Hurry up and lie down!

- We were almost done though.
- Okay.

[Let's finish the song!]
We can do it.
Right now, I'm on my way.

[Let's finally go to bed]
Let's sleep now.
We need to be ready for tomorrow.

[Make sure to check out
the full video of them sleeping!]

[Very hungry because of last night]
Aren't you guys hungry
because we didn't eat yesterday?
